In this post, we dive into six insightful guides that explore the latest trends, applications, and implications of AI. html:
13 Dec 2024

6 New Guides About AI & the Future

Artificial Intelligence is reshaping industries, driving innovation, and redefining what’s possible in our daily lives. As this technology evolves, staying informed is essential to understanding its impact on the future. In this post, we dive into six insightful guides that explore the latest trends, applications, and implications of AI. Whether you’re a tech enthusiast, business leader, or just curious about the future, these guides offer a glimpse into the transformative power of AI and what lies ahead.

Mastering AI Prompt Engineering: The Ultimate Guide for ChatGPT Users

by Adriano Damiao

Release Date: September 15 2024

Mastering AI Prompt Engineering is your guide to unlocking AI’s full potential. Learn to craft precise, effective prompts for accurate results, creative content, and problem-solving. With practical tips and advanced techniques, this book empowers you to turn AI into a powerful collaborator. It all starts with the right prompt!

Buy on Amazon

The Nvidia Way: Jensen Huang and the Making of a Tech Giant

by Tae Kim

Release Date: December 10 2024

A rare view into Nvidia’s distinct culture and Jensen’s management principles, The Nvidia Way is a book for our moment as well as an instant classic of business history, with enduring lessons for entrepreneurs and managers alike.

Buy on Amazon

Genesis: Artificial Intelligence, Hope, and the Human Spirit

by Henry A. Kissinger

Release Date: November 19 2024

In his final book, the late Henry Kissinger joins forces with two leading technologists to mount “a profound exploration” (Walter Isaacson) of the epochal challenges and opportunities presented by the revolution in Artificial Intelligence: a breakthrough that dramatically empowers people in all walks of life while also raising urgent questions about the future of humanity.

Buy on Amazon

2084 and the AI Revolution

by John C. Lennox

Release Date: November 26 2024

You don’t have to be a computer scientist to have discerning conversations about artificial intelligence and technology. We all wonder where we’re headed. Even now, technological innovations and machine learning have a daily impact on our lives, and many of us see good reasons to dread the future. Are we doomed to the surveillance society imagined in George Orwell’s 1984??

Buy on Amazon

AI Today: OI Tomorrow: The Dawn of Organoid Intelligence

by Edmund J.B. White

Release Date: November 29 2024

In this groundbreaking book, renowned biomedical innovator Edmund J.B. White explores the revolutionary potential of organoid intelligence (OI)—the fusion of biology and technology that creates intelligence from living neurons. Imagine a layer of human brain cells barely the size of a fingernail learning to play Pong; this is the exciting reality OI presents.

Buy on Amazon

Smarter Healthcare with AI

by Hassan A. Tetteh

Release Date: November 12 2024

Smarter Healthcare with AI by Dr. Hassan A. Tetteh offers a comprehensive look at the transformative power of artificial intelligence in healthcare, grounded in the author’s extensive military medicine experience.

Buy on Amazon
